verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1860>promises,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> let us <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3436>defilement<s%> of <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2005>perfecting<s%> <S%G42>holiness<s%> in the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5562>Make<s%> <S%G5562>room<s%> for us [in your hearts;] we <S%G91>wronged<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one,<s%> we <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one,<s%> we <S%G4122>took<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one.<s%>

I do not <S%G3004>speak<s%> to <S%G2633>condemn<s%> you; for I have <S%G4275>said<s%> <S%G4275>before<s%> that you are in our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4880>die<s%> <S%G4880>together<s%> and to <S%G4800>live<s%> <S%G4800>together.<s%>

<S%G4183>Great<s%> is my <S%G3954>confidence<s%> in you, <S%G4183>great<s%> is my <S%G2746>boasting<s%> on your <S%G5228>behalf;<s%> I am <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3874>comfort.<s%> I am <S%G5248>overflowing<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> our <S%G2347>affliction.<s%>

For <S%G2532>even<s%> when we <S%G2064>came<s%> into <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> our <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G425>rest,<s%> but we were <S%G2346>afflicted<s%> on <S%G3956>every<s%> side: <S%G3163>conflicts<s%> <S%G1855>without,<s%> <S%G5401>fears<s%> <S%G2081>within.<s%>
But <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G3870>comforts<s%> the <S%G5011>depressed,<s%> <S%G3870>comforted<s%> us by the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus;<s%>

and not <S%G3440>only<s%> by his <S%G3952>coming,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> by the <S%G3874>comfort<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G3870>comforted<s%> in you, as he <S%G312>reported<s%> to us your <S%G1972>longing,<s%> your <S%G3602>mourning,<s%> your <S%G2205>zeal<s%> for me; <S%G5620>so<s%> that I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> even <S%G3123>more.<s%>

For <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G3076>caused<s%> you <S%G3076>sorrow<s%> by my <S%G1992>letter,<s%> I do not <S%G3338>regret<s%> it; <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I did <S%G3338>regret<s%> it – [for] I <S%G991>see<s%> that that <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G3076>caused<s%> you <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2532>only<s%> for a <S%G5610>while<s%> –

I <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> not that you were <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> but that you were <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful<s%> to [the point of] <S%G3341>repentance;<s%> for you were <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [the will of] <S%G2316>God,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you might not <S%G2210>suffer<s%> <S%G2210>loss<s%> in <S%G3367>anything<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> us.

For the <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> that is <S%G2596>according<s%> to [the will of] <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2038>produces<s%> a <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G278>without<s%> <S%G278>regret,<s%> [leading] to <S%G4991>salvation;<s%> but the <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2716>produces<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

For <S%G2400>behold<s%> <S%G4214>what<s%> <S%G4710>earnestness<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G846>thing,<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> has <S%G2716>produced<s%> in you: <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G627>vindication<s%> of yourselves, <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G24>indignation,<s%> <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G1972>longing,<s%> <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G2205>zeal,<s%> <S%G235>what<s%> <S%G1557>avenging<s%> of <S%G1557>wrong!<s%> In <S%G3956>everything<s%> you <S%G4921>demonstrated<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to be <S%G53>innocent<s%> in the <S%G4229>matter.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G1487>although<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you [it was] not for the <S%G1752>sake<s%> of the <S%G91>offender,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> for the <S%G1752>sake<s%> of the one <S%G91>offended,<s%> but that your <S%G4710>earnestness<s%> on our <S%G5228>behalf<s%> might be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>known<s%> to you in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> we have been <S%G3870>comforted.<s%> And <S%G1909>besides<s%> our <S%G3874>comfort,<s%> we <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> <S%G4057>even<s%> <S%G3123>much<s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> for the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> his <S%G4151>spirit<s%> has been <S%G373>refreshed<s%> by you <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> in <S%G5100>anything<s%> I have <S%G2744>boasted<s%> to him <S%G5228>about<s%> you, I was not <S%G2617>put<s%> to <S%G2617>shame;<s%> but as we <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to you in <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G1096>proved<s%> to be [the] <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And his <S%G4698>affection<s%> <S%G4053>abounds<s%> <S%G4053>all<s%> the <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you, as he <S%G363>remembers<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> you <S%G1209>received<s%> him with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling.<s%>
I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> that in <S%G3956>everything<s%> I <S%G2292>have<s%> <S%G2292>confidence<s%> in you.
